item.title: Excellent new sxore features
item.description: After my recent griping about sxore and the recent lack of development, I’m delighted to see that things are on the move again. They have just upgraded the logon capabilites. In addition to the standard sxore/sxip, you can now login using OpenID and i-name. As an existing sxore user, I can continue to login using sxore.com as my homesite. But once I enable the extra identifiers on my sxore account, I can also logon using any of the current implementations of OpenID including Verisign PIP, claimID and MyOpenID.
